bike.description: Specialized M4 Premium Aluminum double-butted smooth weld, w/ fender and rack braze-ons, forged dropouts, kickstand mount

Specialized double-butted, alloy Flat-Top bar, 31.8mm, 10-degree back bend
Specialized Body Geometry XCT Men's, dual compound, lock-on
Magura MTS, hydraulic custom disc brake, 160mm rotor
Magura MTS hydraulic custom disc brake, 160mm rotor
KMC X-10, 10-speed, reusable Missing Link, full nickel plate
Wellgo, lightweight alloy, LSL sealed bearings w/ reflectors
Disc hub, loose ball, Hi Lo flange, machined disc side, dual lock nuts w/ 19mm contact, QR
